lyrics:
98 contributorstranslationstürkçeportuguêshouse of memories lyricsintro
oh whoaohohoh ohohohohoh
whoaohohoh ohohohohoh

verse 1
if youre a lover you should know
the lonely moments just get lonelier
the longer youre in love than if you were alone
memories turn into daydreams become a taboo
i dont want to be afraid the deeper that i go
it takes my breath away soft hearts electric souls
heart to heart and eyes to eyes is this taboo

chorus
baby we built this house on memories
take my picture now shake it til you see it
and when your fantasies become your legacy
promise me a place in your house of memories

postchorus
oh whoaohohoh ohohohohoh
whoaohohoh ohohohohoh

verse 2
i think of you from time to time more than i thought i would
you were just too kind and i was too young to know
thats all that really matters i was a fool
you might also likechorus

whoaohohoh ohohohohoh

bridge
those thoughts of past lovers theyll always haunt me
i wish i could believe youd never wrong me
then will you remember me in the same way as i remember you
